title: All Supports are Currently Terrible...
body:
Because none of them are capable of defending against a 4v2 botlane tower dive...

Can Riot please buff tower damage and durability already? This is getting awful.

replies.body:
This post makes no sense. It's like saying, "All tanks are terrible because they can't dive the fountain 1v5".

Supports were never meant to successfully defend 4v2. Yes, they need to shift the meta away from the "clown fiesta bot" meta, but that has nothing to do with supports being good or bad.

Taric ult

Janna resets the fight
